title: Overcome
overview: Violet Myers carries on a thrilling affair with a man she'll never love in She Ruined Me. Freya Parker learns the art of domination from the best, but then the student surpasses the master in Under the Skin. Anna Claire Clouds has so much to prepare, but she'll have tosqueeze in an unexpected visitor Before the Guests Arrive. And in Over Thinking, Lilly Bell lets a man violate the sanctity of her wedding vows...while her husband watches. Each woman rises to the challenge posed by her own desires when she finds herself Overcome.
